name: cav
description: Cav is bot to log all the messages sent in your server in one place.

scripts.brun: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); fs.copyFile('package.json', './src/cpackage.json', (err) => { if (err) throw err; console.log('package.json was copied to cpackage.json'); });" && tsc && node dist/index.js

author: xYossaf
